Improvements.Improvement: Refactor repeated code into separate method
Improvements.Description: The code for validating the last path element against the collection type is repeated three times. This should be refactored into a separate method to avoid redundancy.

Improvements.Improvement: Replace multiple if statements with switch-case
Improvements.Description: Instead of using multiple if statements to check the operator type, use a switch-case. It will make the code more readable and improve performance as it will stop checking as soon as it finds a match.
